text: Nan adarasi, ia fɨrighɨrasa God ifonge, egha kamaghɨn a ian dia. Eghtɨ ia ua Moses Osirizir Arazibar apengan ikian kogh kamaghɨn nɨghnɨghan markɨ suam, “Moses Osirizir Araziba e ikiagharɨghizɨ, e arazir kaba ategha fɨriaghɨre. Egh e navir ghurimɨn arazibar amuam.” Moses Osirizir Arazibar mɨgɨrɨgɨaba, da bar uari inigha akar vamɨran iti, “Nɨ uabɨra uabɨ gifongezɨ moghɨn, gumazamizir igharazibagh ifongegh.” Ia bar Godɨn gumazamizibar ingangarir gumazamizibar mɨn ikɨ, uarira uarigh ifongegh. Egh ia uarir atar pura tintinibar uariv sogh, egh deravɨra nɨghnɨgh. Ia uarigh asɨghasɨgham.
